type expr = 
      VarX
    | VarY
    | Sine     of expr
    | Cosine   of expr
    | Average  of expr * expr
    | Times    of expr * expr
    | Thresh   of expr * expr * expr * expr	
    | OneOver  of expr
    | OneOverAvg of expr * expr * expr

(*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX
XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX
*)
let rec exprToString e = 
  match e with
    | VarX		    -> "x"
    | VarY		    -> "y"
    | Sine e1	    -> "sin(pi *" ^ exprToString e1 ^ ")"
    | Cosine e1	    -> "cos(pi *" ^ exprToString e1 ^ ")"
    | Average (e1, e2)  -> "((" ^ exprToString e1 ^ "+"^ exprToString e2 ^")/2)"
    | Times (e1, e2)    -> "(" ^ exprToString e1 ^ "*" ^ exprToString e2^")"
    | Thresh (e1, e2, e3, e4) -> "("^ exprToString e1 ^"<"^ exprToString e2 ^
                                 "?"^ exprToString e3 ^":"^ exprToString e4 ^ ")"
    | OneOver e1	    -> "(1/" ^ exprToString e1 ^ ")"
    | OneOverAvg (e1,e2,e3) -> "(1/((" ^ exprToString e1 ^ " + " ^ 
                               exprToString e2 ^ " + " 
                               ^ exprToString e3 ^ ")/2))"


(*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)

let sampleExpr1 = Thresh(VarX,VarY,VarX,(Times(Sine(VarX),Cosine(Average(VarX,VarY)))));;

let _ = exprToString sampleExpr1 




(*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX
XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX
XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX
XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)

let buildX()                       = VarX
let buildY()                       = VarY
let buildSine(e)                   = Sine(e)
let buildCosine(e)                 = Cosine(e)
let buildAverage(e1,e2)            = Average(e1,e2)
let buildTimes(e1,e2)              = Times(e1,e2)
let buildThresh(a,b,a_less,b_less) = Thresh(a,b,a_less,b_less)
let buildOneOver(e)		   = OneOver(e)
let buildOneOverAvg(e1,e2,e3)      = OneOverAvg(e1,e2,e3)


let pi = 4.0 *. atan 1.0

(*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX
XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)

let rec eval (e,x,y) = 
  match e with
    | VarX		      -> x
    | VarY		      -> y
    | Sine e1	      -> sin(pi *. (eval(e1,x,y)))
    | Cosine e1	      -> cos(pi *. (eval(e1,x,y)))
    | Average (e1,e2)     -> (eval(e1,x,y) +. eval(e2,x,y)) /. 2.0
    | Times (e1, e2)      -> (eval(e1,x,y) *. eval(e2,x,y))
    | Thresh (e1,e2,e3,e4) -> if (eval(e1,x,y) < eval(e2,x,y)) then eval(e3,x,y)				      else eval(e4,x,y);
    | OneOver(e)	      -> if eval(e,x,y) > 1.0 then 1.0/.eval(e,x,y) 
        else 1.0/.3.0;
    | OneOverAvg(e1,e2,e3) -> if (eval(e1,x,y) +. eval(e2,x,y) +. eval(e3,x,y)) > 1.0
        then 1.0/.(eval(e1,x,y) +. eval(e2,x,y) +. eval(e3,x,y)) else -1.0/3.0;;


(*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX
XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX
XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX
XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)



let eval_fn e (x,y) = 
  let rv = eval (e,x,y) in
    assert (-1.0 <= rv && rv <= 1.0);
    rv

let sampleExpr =
  buildCosine(buildSine(buildTimes(buildCosine(buildAverage(buildCosine(
                                                              buildX()),buildTimes(buildCosine (buildCosine (buildAverage
                                                                                                               (buildTimes (buildY(),buildY()),buildCosine (buildX())))),
                                                                                   buildCosine (buildTimes (buildSine (buildCosine
                                                                                                                         (buildY())),buildAverage (buildSine (buildX()), buildTimes
                                                                                                                                                                           (buildX(),buildX()))))))),buildY())))

let sampleExpr2 =
  buildThresh(buildX(),buildY(),buildSine(buildX()),buildCosine(buildY()))


(*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)

(*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX
XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX
XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX
XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX

XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX
XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX
*)

let rec build (rand, depth) = 
  if depth <= 0 then
    let randNum = rand(0,2) in
      match randNum with
        | 0   -> buildX()
        | 1   -> buildY()
  else
    let randNum = rand(0,9) in
      match randNum with
        | 0   -> build(rand, depth - 1)
        | 1   -> build(rand, depth - 1)
        | 2   -> buildSine(build(rand, depth - 1))
        | 3   -> buildCosine(build(rand, depth - 1))
        | 4   -> buildAverage(build(rand, depth - 1), build(rand, depth - 1))
        | 5   -> buildTimes(build(rand, depth - 1), build(rand, depth - 1))
        | 6   -> buildThresh(build(rand, depth - 1), build(rand, depth - 1),
                             build(rand, depth - 1), build(rand, depth - 1))
        | 7   -> buildOneOver(build(rand, depth - 1))
        | 8   -> buildOneOverAvg(build(rand, depth - 1), build(rand, depth - 1),
                                 build(rand, depth - 1));;

XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX
*)

  if low > high then () else 
    let _ = f low in 
      ffor (low+1,high,f)

let emitGrayscale (f,n,name) =
  (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
  let fname  = ("art_g_"^name) in
  let chan = open_out (fname^".pgm") in
  (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
  let n2p1 = n*2+1 in   
  let _ = output_string chan (Format.sprintf "P5 %d %d 255\n" n2p1 n2p1) in
  let _ = 
    ffor (-n, n, 
          fun ix ->
            ffor (-n, n, 
                  fun iy ->
                    (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
                    let x = toReal(ix,n) in
                    let y = toReal(iy,n) in
                    (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
                    let z = f (x,y) in
                    (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
                    let iz = toIntensity(z) in
                      (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
                      output_char chan (char_of_int iz))) in 
    close_out chan;
    ignore(Sys.command ("convert "^fname^".pgm "^fname^".jpg"));
    ignore(Sys.command ("rm "^fname^".pgm"))

  (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)

  let chan = open_out (fname^".ppm") in
  (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)

                    let y = toReal(iy,n) in
                    (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)

let prefix130 = "130" (*XXXXXXXX*)
let print130 s = print_string (prefix130^">>"^s)

exception ErrorCode of string

exception TestException

type result = Pass | Fail | ErrorCode of string

let score = ref 0
let max = ref 0
let timeout = 300

let runWTimeout (f,arg,out,time) = 
  try if compare (f arg) out = 0 then Pass else Fail
  with e -> (print130 ("Uncaught Exception: "^(Printexc.to_string e)); ErrorCode "exception") 

let testTest () =
  let testGood x = 1 in
  let testBad x = 0 in 
  let testException x = raise TestException in
  let rec testTimeout x = testTimeout x in
    runWTimeout(testGood,0,1,5) = Pass &&  
    runWTimeout(testBad,0,1,5) = Fail &&  
    runWTimeout(testException,0,1,5) = ErrorCode "exception" && 
    runWTimeout(testTimeout,0,1,5) = ErrorCode "timeout"

let runTest ((f,arg,out),points,name) =
  let _   = max := !max + points in
  let outs = 
    match runWTimeout(f,arg,out,timeout) with 
        Pass -> (score := !score + points; "[pass]")
      | Fail -> "[fail]"
      | ErrorCode e -> "[error: "^e^"]"  in
    name^" "^outs^" ("^(string_of_int points)^")\n"

let explode s = 
  let rec _exp i = 
    if i >= String.length s then [] else (s.[i])::(_exp (i+1)) in
    _exp 0

let implode cs = 
  String.concat "" (List.map (String.make 1) cs)

let drop_paren s = 
  implode (List.filter (fun c -> not (List.mem c ['(';' ';')'])) (explode s))

let eq_real p (r1,r2) = 
  (r1 -. r2) < p || (r2 -. r1) < p

let mkTest f x y name = runTest ((f, x, y), 1, name)

let rec eval (e,x,y) = 
match e with
| VarX		      -> x
| VarY		      -> y
| Sine e1	      -> sin(pi *. (eval(e1,x,y)))
| Cosine e1	      -> cos(pi *. (eval(e1,x,y)))
| Average (e1,e2)     -> (eval(e1,x,y) +. eval(e2,x,y)) /. 2.0
| Times (e1, e2)      -> (eval(e1,x,y) *. eval(e2,x,y))
| Thresh (e1,e2,e3,e4) -> if (eval(e1,x,y) < eval(e2,x,y)) then eval(e3,x,y)				      else eval(e4,x,y);
| OneOver(e)	      -> if eval(e,x,y) > 1.0 then 1.0/.eval(e,x,y) 
else 1.0/.3.0;
| OneOverAvg(e1,e2,e3) -> if (eval(e1,x,y) +. eval(e2,x,y) +. eval(e3,x,y)) > 1.0
then 1.0/.(eval(e1,x,y) +. eval(e2,x,y) +. eval(e3,x,y)) else -1.0/.3.0

let emitGrayscale (f,n,name) =
(* Open the output file and write the header *)
let fname  = ("art_g_"^name) in
let chan = open_out (fname^".pgm") in
(* Picture will be 2*N+1 pixels on a side *)
let n2p1 = n*2+1 in   
let _ = output_string chan (Format.sprintf "P5 %d %d 255\n" n2p1 n2p1) in
let _ = 
ffor (-n, n, 
fun ix ->
ffor (-n, n, 
fun iy ->
(* Convert grid locations to [-1,1] *)
let x = toReal(ix,n) in
let y = toReal(iy,n) in
(* Apply the given random function *)
let z = f (x,y) in
(* Convert the result to a grayscale value *)
let iz = toIntensity(z) in
(* Emit one byte for this pixel *)
output_char chan (char_of_int iz))) in 
close_out chan;
ignore(Sys.command ("convert "^fname^".pgm "^fname^".jpg"));
ignore(Sys.command ("rm "^fname^".pgm"))

let doRandomGray (depth,seed1,seed2) =
(* Initialize random-number generator g *)
let g = makeRand(seed1,seed2) in
(* Generate a random expression, and turn it into an ML function *)
let e = build (g,depth) in
let _ = print_string (exprToString e) in
let f = eval_fn e in
(* 301 x 301 pixels *)
let n = 150 in
(* Emit the picture *)
let name = Format.sprintf "%d_%d_%d" depth seed1 seed2 in
emitGrayscale (f,n,name)

           ((build (rand, (depth - 1))), (build (rand, (depth - 1))))
     | 5 ->
         buildTimes
           ((build (rand, (depth - 1))), (build (rand, (depth - 1))))
     | 6 ->
         buildThresh
           ((build (rand, (depth - 1))), (build (rand, (depth - 1))),
             (build (rand, (depth - 1))), (build (rand, (depth - 1))))
     | 7 -> buildOneOver (build (rand, (depth - 1)))
     | 8 ->
         buildOneOverAvg
           ((build (rand, (depth - 1))), (build (rand, (depth - 1))),
             (build (rand, (depth - 1)))));;

let emitGrayscale (f,n,name) =
  let fname = "art_g_" ^ name in
  let chan = open_out (fname ^ ".pgm") in
  let n2p1 = (n * 2) + 1 in
  let _ = output_string chan (Format.sprintf "P5 %d %d 255\n" n2p1 n2p1) in
  let _ =
    ffor
      ((- n), n,
        (fun ix  ->
           ffor
             ((- n), n,
               (fun iy  ->
                  let x = toReal (ix, n) in
                  let y = toReal (iy, n) in
                  let z = f (x, y) in
                  let iz = toIntensity z in output_char chan (char_of_int iz))))) in
  close_out chan;
  ignore (Sys.command ("convert " ^ (fname ^ (".pgm " ^ (fname ^ ".jpg")))));
  ignore (Sys.command ("rm " ^ (fname ^ ".pgm")));;

let eval_fn e (x,y) =
  let rv = eval (e, x, y) in assert (((-1.0) <= rv) && (rv <= 1.0)); rv;;

let rec exprToString e =
  match e with
  | VarX  -> "x"
  | VarY  -> "y"
  | Sine e1 -> "sin(pi *" ^ ((exprToString e1) ^ ")")
  | Cosine e1 -> "cos(pi *" ^ ((exprToString e1) ^ ")")
  | Average (e1,e2) ->
      "((" ^ ((exprToString e1) ^ ("+" ^ ((exprToString e2) ^ ")/2)")))
  | Times (e1,e2) ->
      "(" ^ ((exprToString e1) ^ ("*" ^ ((exprToString e2) ^ ")")))
  | Thresh (e1,e2,e3,e4) ->
      "(" ^
        ((exprToString e1) ^
           ("<" ^
              ((exprToString e2) ^
                 ("?" ^
                    ((exprToString e3) ^ (":" ^ ((exprToString e4) ^ ")")))))))
  | OneOver e1 -> "(1/" ^ ((exprToString e1) ^ ")")
  | OneOverAvg (e1,e2,e3) ->
      "(1/((" ^
        ((exprToString e1) ^
           (" + " ^
              ((exprToString e2) ^ (" + " ^ ((exprToString e3) ^ ")/2))")))));;

let makeRand (seed1,seed2) =
  let seed = Array.of_list [seed1; seed2] in
  let s = Random.State.make seed in
  fun (x,y)  -> x + (Random.State.int s (y - x));;

let doRandomGray (depth,seed1,seed2) =
  let g = makeRand (seed1, seed2) in
  let e = build (g, depth) in
  let _ = print_string (exprToString e) in
  let f = eval_fn e in
  let n = 150 in
  let name = Format.sprintf "%d_%d_%d" depth seed1 seed2 in
  emitGrayscale (f, n, name);;

let pi = 4.0 *. (atan 1.0);;

let rec eval (e,x,y) =
  match e with
  | VarX  -> x
  | VarY  -> y
  | Sine e1 -> sin (pi *. (eval (e1, x, y)))
  | Cosine e1 -> cos (pi *. (eval (e1, x, y)))
  | Average (e1,e2) -> ((eval (e1, x, y)) +. (eval (e2, x, y))) /. 2.0
  | Times (e1,e2) -> (eval (e1, x, y)) *. (eval (e2, x, y))
  | Thresh (e1,e2,e3,e4) ->
      if (eval (e1, x, y)) < (eval (e2, x, y))
      then eval (e3, x, y)
      else eval (e4, x, y)
  | OneOver e ->
      if (eval (e, x, y)) > 1.0 then 1.0 /. (eval (e, x, y)) else 1.0 /. 3.0
  | OneOverAvg (e1,e2,e3) ->
      if
        (((eval (e1, x, y)) +. (eval (e2, x, y))) +. (eval (e3, x, y))) > 1.0
      then
        1.0 /.
          (((eval (e1, x, y)) +. (eval (e2, x, y))) +. (eval (e3, x, y)))
      else (-1.0) /. 3.0;;

  if low > high then () else (let _ = f low in ffor ((low + 1), high, f));;

let toIntensity z = int_of_float (127.5 +. (127.5 *. z));;

let toReal (i,n) = (float_of_int i) /. (float_of_int n);;

  | VarX
  | VarY
  | Sine of expr
  | Cosine of expr
  | Average of expr* expr
  | Times of expr* expr
  | Thresh of expr* expr* expr* expr
  | OneOver of expr
  | OneOverAvg of expr* expr* expr;;

match e with
| VarX		      -> x
| VarY		      -> y
| Sine e1	      -> sin(pi *. (eval(e1,x,y)))
| Cosine e1	      -> cos(pi *. (eval(e1,x,y)))
| Average (e1,e2)     -> (eval(e1,x,y) +. eval(e2,x,y)) /. 2.0
| Times (e1, e2)      -> (eval(e1,x,y) *. eval(e2,x,y))
| Thresh (e1,e2,e3,e4) -> if (eval(e1,x,y) < eval(e2,x,y)) then eval(e3,x,y)				      else eval(e4,x,y);
| OneOver(e)	      -> if eval(e,x,y) > 1.0 then 1.0/.eval(e,x,y) 
else 1.0/.3.0;
| OneOverAvg(e1,e2,e3) -> if (eval(e1,x,y) +. eval(e2,x,y) +. eval(e3,x,y)) > 1.0

runWTimeout(testGood,0,1,5) = Pass &&

name^" "^outs^" ("^(string_of_int points)^")\n"

  | (name, num)::rest -> if k = name

let removeDuplicates l = 
  let rec helper (seen,rest) = 
    match rest with 
      | []   -> seen
      | h::t -> 
          let seen' = if (List.mem h seen) = true then seen else [h]@seen in
          let rest' = t in 
            helper (seen',rest') 
  in
    List.rev (helper ([],l));;

(*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)

  | (b', c) -> if c = true then wwhile (f, b') else b';;

    | Sine e1	    -> "sin(pi *" ^ exprToString e1 ^ ")"
    | Cosine e1	    -> "cos(pi *" ^ exprToString e1 ^ ")"
    | Average (e1, e2)  -> "((" ^ exprToString e1 ^ "+"^ exprToString e2 ^")/2)"
    | Times (e1, e2)    -> "(" ^ exprToString e1 ^ "*" ^ exprToString e2^")"
    | Thresh (e1, e2, e3, e4) -> "("^ exprToString e1 ^"<"^ exprToString e2 ^
                                 "?"^ exprToString e3 ^":"^ exprToString e4 ^ ")"
    | OneOver e1	    -> "(1/" ^ exprToString e1 ^ ")"
    | OneOverAvg (e1,e2,e3) -> "(1/((" ^ exprToString e1 ^ " + " ^ 
                               exprToString e2 ^ " + " 
                               ^ exprToString e3 ^ ")/2))"

let buildX()                       = VarX
let buildY()                       = VarY
let buildSine(e)                   = Sine(e)
let buildCosine(e)                 = Cosine(e)
let buildAverage(e1,e2)            = Average(e1,e2)
let buildTimes(e1,e2)              = Times(e1,e2)
let buildThresh(a,b,a_less,b_less) = Thresh(a,b,a_less,b_less)
let buildOneOver(e)		   = OneOver(e)
let buildOneOverAvg(e1,e2,e3)      = OneOverAvg(e1,e2,e3)


let pi = 4.0 *. atan 1.0

let rec eval (e,x,y) = 
  match e with
    | VarX		      -> x
    | VarY		      -> y
    | Sine e1	      -> sin(pi *. (eval(e1,x,y)))
    | Cosine e1	      -> cos(pi *. (eval(e1,x,y)))
    | Average (e1,e2)     -> (eval(e1,x,y) +. eval(e2,x,y)) /. 2.0
    | Times (e1, e2)      -> (eval(e1,x,y) *. eval(e2,x,y))
    | Thresh (e1,e2,e3,e4) -> if (eval(e1,x,y) < eval(e2,x,y)) then eval(e3,x,y)				      else eval(e4,x,y);
    | OneOver(e)	      -> if eval(e,x,y) > 1.0 then 1.0/.eval(e,x,y) 
        else 1.0/.3.0;
    | OneOverAvg(e1,e2,e3) -> if (eval(e1,x,y) +. eval(e2,x,y) +. eval(e3,x,y)) > 1.0
        then 1.0/.(eval(e1,x,y) +. eval(e2,x,y) +. eval(e3,x,y)) else -1.0/.3.0;;


(*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX
XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX
XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX
XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)



let eval_fn e (x,y) = 
  let rv = eval (e,x,y) in
    assert (-1.0 <= rv && rv <= 1.0);
    rv

let rec build (rand, depth) = 
  if depth <= 0 then
    let randNum = rand(0,2) in
      match randNum with
        | 0   -> buildX()
        | 1   -> buildY()
  else
    let randNum = rand(0,9) in
      match randNum with
        | 0   -> build(rand, depth - 1)
        | 1   -> build(rand, depth - 1)
        | 2   -> buildSine(build(rand, depth - 1))
        | 3   -> buildCosine(build(rand, depth - 1))
        | 4   -> buildAverage(build(rand, depth - 1), build(rand, depth - 1))
        | 5   -> buildTimes(build(rand, depth - 1), build(rand, depth - 1))
        | 6   -> buildThresh(build(rand, depth - 1), build(rand, depth - 1),
                             build(rand, depth - 1), build(rand, depth - 1))
        | 7   -> buildOneOver(build(rand, depth - 1))
        | 8   -> buildOneOverAvg(build(rand, depth - 1), build(rand, depth - 1),
                                 build(rand, depth - 1));;

let emitGrayscale (f,n,name) =
  (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
  let fname  = ("art_g_"^name) in
  let chan = open_out (fname^".pgm") in
  (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
  let n2p1 = n*2+1 in   
  let _ = output_string chan (Format.sprintf "P5 %d %d 255\n" n2p1 n2p1) in
  let _ = 
    ffor (-n, n, 
          fun ix ->
            ffor (-n, n, 
                  fun iy ->
                    (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
                    let x = toReal(ix,n) in
                    let y = toReal(iy,n) in
                    (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
                    let z = f (x,y) in
                    (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
                    let iz = toIntensity(z) in
                      (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
                      output_char chan (char_of_int iz))) in 
    close_out chan;
    ignore(Sys.command ("convert "^fname^".pgm "^fname^".jpg"));
    ignore(Sys.command ("rm "^fname^".pgm"))

let prefix130 = "130" (*XXXXXXXX*)
let print130 s = print_string (prefix130^">>"^s)

exception ErrorCode of string

exception TestException

type result = Pass | Fail | ErrorCode of string

let score = ref 0
let max = ref 0
let timeout = 300

let runWTimeout (f,arg,out,time) = 
  try if compare (f arg) out = 0 then Pass else Fail
  with e -> (print130 ("Uncaught Exception: "^(Printexc.to_string e)); ErrorCode "exception") 

let testTest () =
  let testGood x = 1 in
  let testBad x = 0 in 
  let testException x = raise TestException in
  let rec testTimeout x = testTimeout x in
    runWTimeout(testGood,0,1,5) = Pass &&  
    runWTimeout(testBad,0,1,5) = Fail &&  
    runWTimeout(testException,0,1,5) = ErrorCode "exception" && 
    runWTimeout(testTimeout,0,1,5) = ErrorCode "timeout"

let runTest ((f,arg,out),points,name) =
  let _   = max := !max + points in
  let outs = 
    match runWTimeout(f,arg,out,timeout) with 
        Pass -> (score := !score + points; "[pass]")
      | Fail -> "[fail]"
      | ErrorCode e -> "[error: "^e^"]"  in
    name^" "^outs^" ("^(string_of_int points)^")\n"

(*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
let explode s = 
  let rec _exp i = 
    if i >= String.length s then [] else (s.[i])::(_exp (i+1)) in
    _exp 0

let implode cs = 
  String.concat "" (List.map (String.make 1) cs)

let drop_paren s = 
  implode (List.filter (fun c -> not (List.mem c ['(';' ';')'])) (explode s))

let eq_real p (r1,r2) = 
  (r1 -. r2) < p || (r2 -. r1) < p

let mkTest f x y name = runTest ((f, x, y), 1, name)

let toIntensity z = int_of_float (127.5 +. (127.5 *. z));;

let toReal (i,n) = (float_of_int i) /. (float_of_int n);;

type expr =
  | VarX
  | VarY
  | Sine of expr
  | Cosine of expr
  | Average of expr* expr
  | Times of expr* expr
  | Thresh of expr* expr* expr* expr
  | OneOver of expr
  | OneOverAvg of expr* expr* expr;;

let buildAverage (e1,e2) = Average (e1, e2);;

let buildCosine e = Cosine e;;

let buildOneOver e = OneOver e;;

let buildOneOverAvg (e1,e2,e3) = OneOverAvg (e1, e2, e3);;

let buildSine e = Sine e;;

let buildThresh (a,b,a_less,b_less) = Thresh (a, b, a_less, b_less);;

let buildTimes (e1,e2) = Times (e1, e2);;

let buildX () = VarX;;

let buildY () = VarY;;

let rec build (rand,depth) =
  if depth <= 0
  then
    let randNum = rand (0, 2) in
    match randNum with | 0 -> buildX () | 1 -> buildY ()
  else
    (let randNum = rand (0, 9) in
     match randNum with
     | 0 -> build (rand, (depth - 1))
     | 1 -> build (rand, (depth - 1))
     | 2 -> buildSine (build (rand, (depth - 1)))
     | 3 -> buildCosine (build (rand, (depth - 1)))
     | 4 ->
         buildAverage
           ((build (rand, (depth - 1))), (build (rand, (depth - 1))))
     | 5 ->
         buildTimes
           ((build (rand, (depth - 1))), (build (rand, (depth - 1))))
     | 6 ->
         buildThresh
           ((build (rand, (depth - 1))), (build (rand, (depth - 1))),
             (build (rand, (depth - 1))), (build (rand, (depth - 1))))
     | 7 -> buildOneOver (build (rand, (depth - 1)))
     | 8 ->
         buildOneOverAvg
           ((build (rand, (depth - 1))), (build (rand, (depth - 1))),
             (build (rand, (depth - 1)))));;

let emitGrayscale (f,n,name) =
  let fname = "art_g_" ^ name in
  let chan = open_out (fname ^ ".pgm") in
  let n2p1 = (n * 2) + 1 in
  let _ = output_string chan (Format.sprintf "P5 %d %d 255\n" n2p1 n2p1) in
  let _ =
    ffor
      ((- n), n,
        (fun ix  ->
           ffor
             ((- n), n,
               (fun iy  ->
                  let x = toReal (ix, n) in
                  let y = toReal (iy, n) in
                  let z = f (x, y) in
                  let iz = toIntensity z in output_char chan (char_of_int iz))))) in
  close_out chan;
  ignore (Sys.command ("convert " ^ (fname ^ (".pgm " ^ (fname ^ ".jpg")))));
  ignore (Sys.command ("rm " ^ (fname ^ ".pgm")));;

let eval_fn e (x,y) =
  let rv = eval (e, x, y) in assert (((-1.0) <= rv) && (rv <= 1.0)); rv;;

let rec exprToString e =
  match e with
  | VarX  -> "x"
  | VarY  -> "y"
  | Sine e1 -> "sin(pi *" ^ ((exprToString e1) ^ ")")
  | Cosine e1 -> "cos(pi *" ^ ((exprToString e1) ^ ")")
  | Average (e1,e2) ->
      "((" ^ ((exprToString e1) ^ ("+" ^ ((exprToString e2) ^ ")/2)")))
  | Times (e1,e2) ->
      "(" ^ ((exprToString e1) ^ ("*" ^ ((exprToString e2) ^ ")")))
  | Thresh (e1,e2,e3,e4) ->
      "(" ^
        ((exprToString e1) ^
           ("<" ^
              ((exprToString e2) ^
                 ("?" ^

let pi = 4.0 *. (atan 1.0);;

let rec eval (e,x,y) =
  match e with
  | VarX  -> x
  | VarY  -> y
  | Sine e1 -> sin (pi *. (eval (e1, x, y)))
  | Cosine e1 -> cos (pi *. (eval (e1, x, y)))
  | Average (e1,e2) -> ((eval (e1, x, y)) +. (eval (e2, x, y))) /. 2.0
  | Times (e1,e2) -> (eval (e1, x, y)) *. (eval (e2, x, y))
  | Thresh (e1,e2,e3,e4) ->
      if (eval (e1, x, y)) < (eval (e2, x, y))
      then eval (e3, x, y)
      else eval (e4, x, y)
  | OneOver e ->
      if (eval (e, x, y)) > 1.0 then 1.0 /. (eval (e, x, y)) else 1.0 /. 3.0
  | OneOverAvg (e1,e2,e3) ->
      if
        (((eval (e1, x, y)) +. (eval (e2, x, y))) +. (eval (e3, x, y))) > 1.0
      then
        1.0 /.
          (((eval (e1, x, y)) +. (eval (e2, x, y))) +. (eval (e3, x, y)))
      else (-1.0) /. 3.0;;

let rec ffor (low,high,f) =
  if low > high then () else (let _ = f low in ffor ((low + 1), high, f));;

let toIntensity z = int_of_float (127.5 +. (127.5 *. z));;

let toReal (i,n) = (float_of_int i) /. (float_of_int n);;

type expr =
  | VarX
  | VarY
  | Sine of expr
  | Cosine of expr
  | Average of expr* expr
  | Times of expr* expr
  | Thresh of expr* expr* expr* expr
  | OneOver of expr
  | OneOverAvg of expr* expr* expr;;

let buildAverage (e1,e2) = Average (e1, e2);;

let buildCosine e = Cosine e;;

let buildOneOver e = OneOver e;;

let buildOneOverAvg (e1,e2,e3) = OneOverAvg (e1, e2, e3);;

let buildSine e = Sine e;;

let buildThresh (a,b,a_less,b_less) = Thresh (a, b, a_less, b_less);;

let buildTimes (e1,e2) = Times (e1, e2);;

let buildX () = VarX;;

let buildY () = VarY;;

let rec build (rand,depth) =
  if depth <= 0
  then
    let randNum = rand (0, 2) in
    match randNum with | 0 -> buildX () | 1 -> buildY ()
  else
    (let randNum = rand (0, 9) in
     match randNum with
     | 0 -> build (rand, (depth - 1))
     | 1 -> build (rand, (depth - 1))
     | 2 -> buildSine (build (rand, (depth - 1)))
     | 3 -> buildCosine (build (rand, (depth - 1)))
     | 4 ->
         buildAverage
           ((build (rand, (depth - 1))), (build (rand, (depth - 1))))
     | 5 ->
         buildTimes
           ((build (rand, (depth - 1))), (build (rand, (depth - 1))))
     | 6 ->
         buildThresh
           ((build (rand, (depth - 1))), (build (rand, (depth - 1))),
             (build (rand, (depth - 1))), (build (rand, (depth - 1))))
     | 7 -> buildOneOver (build (rand, (depth - 1)))
     | 8 ->
         buildOneOverAvg
           ((build (rand, (depth - 1))), (build (rand, (depth - 1))),
             (build (rand, (depth - 1)))));;

  let n2p1 = (n * 2) + 1 in
  let _ = output_string chan (Format.sprintf "P6 %d %d 255\n" n2p1 n2p1) in
  let _ =
    ffor
      ((- n), n,
        (fun ix  ->
           ffor
             ((- n), n,

                  let x = toReal (ix, n) in

let removeDuplicates l = 
  let rec helper (seen,rest) = 
    match rest with 
      | []   -> seen
      | h::t -> 
          let seen' = if (List.mem h seen) = true then seen else [h]@seen in
          let rest' = t in 
            helper (seen',rest') 
  in
    List.rev (helper ([],l));;

    | Average (e1, e2)  -> "((" ^ exprToString e1 ^ "+"^ exprToString e2 ^")/2)"
    | Times (e1, e2)    -> "(" ^ exprToString e1 ^ "*" ^ exprToString e2^")"
    | Thresh (e1, e2, e3, e4) -> "("^ exprToString e1 ^"<"^ exprToString e2 ^
                                 "?"^ exprToString e3 ^":"^ exprToString e4 ^ ")"
    | OneOver e1	    -> "(1/" ^ exprToString e1 ^ ")"
    | OneOverAvg (e1,e2,e3) -> "(1/((" ^ exprToString e1 ^ " + " ^

let rec eval (e,x,y) = 
  match e with
    | VarX		      -> x
    | VarY		      -> y
    | Sine e1	      -> sin(pi *. (eval(e1,x,y)))
    | Cosine e1	      -> cos(pi *. (eval(e1,x,y)))
    | Average (e1,e2)     -> (eval(e1,x,y) +. eval(e2,x,y)) /. 2.0
    | Times (e1, e2)      -> (eval(e1,x,y) *. eval(e2,x,y))
    | Thresh (e1,e2,e3,e4) -> if (eval(e1,x,y) < eval(e2,x,y)) then eval(e3,x,y)				      else eval(e4,x,y);
    | OneOver(e)	      -> if eval(e,x,y) > 1.0 then 1.0/.eval(e,x,y) 
        else 1.0/.3.0;
    | OneOverAvg(e1,e2,e3) -> if (eval(e1,x,y) +. eval(e2,x,y) +. eval(e3,x,y)) > 1.0
        then 1.0/.(eval(e1,x,y) +. eval(e2,x,y) +. eval(e3,x,y)) else -1.0/.3.0;;

let rec build (rand, depth) = 
  if depth <= 0 then
    let randNum = rand(0,2) in
      match randNum with
        | 0   -> buildX()
        | 1   -> buildY()
  else
    let randNum = rand(0,9) in
      match randNum with
        | 0   -> build(rand, depth - 1)
        | 1   -> build(rand, depth - 1)
        | 2   -> buildSine(build(rand, depth - 1))
        | 3   -> buildCosine(build(rand, depth - 1))
        | 4   -> buildAverage(build(rand, depth - 1), build(rand, depth - 1))
        | 5   -> buildTimes(build(rand, depth - 1), build(rand, depth - 1))
        | 6   -> buildThresh(build(rand, depth - 1), build(rand, depth - 1),
                             build(rand, depth - 1), build(rand, depth - 1))
        | 7   -> buildOneOver(build(rand, depth - 1))
        | 8   -> buildOneOverAvg(build(rand, depth - 1), build(rand, depth - 1),
                                 build(rand, depth - 1));;

  let seed = (Array.of_list [seed1;seed2]) in
  let s = Random.State.make seed in
    (fun (x,y) -> (x + (Random.State.int s (y-x))))

  if n <= 0 then [] else (g r)::(rseq g r (n-1))

let toIntensity z = int_of_float (127.5 +. (127.5 *. z))

let rec ffor (low,high,f) = 
  if low > high then () else 
    let _ = f low in 
      ffor (low+1,high,f)

let emitGrayscale (f,n,name) =
  (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
  let fname  = ("art_g_"^name) in
  let chan = open_out (fname^".pgm") in
  (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
  let n2p1 = n*2+1 in   
  let _ = output_string chan (Format.sprintf "P5 %d %d 255\n" n2p1 n2p1) in
  let _ = 
    ffor (-n, n, 
          fun ix ->
            ffor (-n, n, 
                  fun iy ->
                    (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
                    let x = toReal(ix,n) in
                    let y = toReal(iy,n) in
                    (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
                    let z = f (x,y) in
                    (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
                    let iz = toIntensity(z) in
                      (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
                      output_char chan (char_of_int iz))) in 
    close_out chan;
    ignore(Sys.command ("convert "^fname^".pgm "^fname^".jpg"));
    ignore(Sys.command ("rm "^fname^".pgm"))

  (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
  let e = build (g,depth) in
  let _ = print_string (exprToString e) in
  let f = eval_fn e in
  (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
  let n = 150 in
  (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
  let name = Format.sprintf "%d_%d_%d" depth seed1 seed2 in
    emitGrayscale (f,n,name)

let key = "" (*XXXXXXXX*)
let prefix130 = "130" (*XXXXXXXX*)
let print130 s = print_string (prefix130^">>"^s)

exception ErrorCode of string

exception TestException

type result = Pass | Fail | ErrorCode of string

let score = ref 0
let max = ref 0
let timeout = 300

let runWTimeout (f,arg,out,time) = 
  try if compare (f arg) out = 0 then Pass else Fail
  with e -> (print130 ("Uncaught Exception: "^(Printexc.to_string e)); ErrorCode "exception") 

let testTest () =
  let testGood x = 1 in
  let testBad x = 0 in 
  let testException x = raise TestException in
  let rec testTimeout x = testTimeout x in
    runWTimeout(testGood,0,1,5) = Pass &&  
    runWTimeout(testBad,0,1,5) = Fail &&  
    runWTimeout(testException,0,1,5) = ErrorCode "exception" && 
    runWTimeout(testTimeout,0,1,5) = ErrorCode "timeout"

let runTest ((f,arg,out),points,name) =
  let _   = max := !max + points in
  let outs = 
    match runWTimeout(f,arg,out,timeout) with 
        Pass -> (score := !score + points; "[pass]")
      | Fail -> "[fail]"
      | ErrorCode e -> "[error: "^e^"]"  in
    name^" "^outs^" ("^(string_of_int points)^")\n"

(*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
let explode s = 
  let rec _exp i = 
    if i >= String.length s then [] else (s.[i])::(_exp (i+1)) in
    _exp 0

let implode cs = 
  String.concat "" (List.map (String.make 1) cs)

let drop_paren s = 
  implode (List.filter (fun c -> not (List.mem c ['(';' ';')'])) (explode s))

let eq_real p (r1,r2) = 
  (r1 -. r2) < p || (r2 -. r1) < p

let mkTest f x y name = runTest ((f, x, y), 1, name)

let badTest () = "WARNING: Your tests are not valid!!\n"

let scoreMsg () = 
  Format.sprintf "Results: Score/Max = %d / %d \n" !score !max

let doTest f = 
  try f () with ex -> 
    Format.sprintf "WARNING: INVALID TEST THROWS EXCEPTION!!: %s \n\n"
      (Printexc.to_string ex)

  let _      = List.iter print130 (report@([scoreMsg()])) in
  let _      = print130 ("Compiled\n")                    in
    (!score, !max)

let pi = 4.0 *. (atan 1.0);;

let rec eval (e,x,y) =
  match e with
  | VarX  -> x
  | VarY  -> y
  | Sine e1 -> sin (pi *. (eval (e1, x, y)))
  | Cosine e1 -> cos (pi *. (eval (e1, x, y)))
  | Average (e1,e2) -> ((eval (e1, x, y)) +. (eval (e2, x, y))) /. 2.0
  | Times (e1,e2) -> (eval (e1, x, y)) *. (eval (e2, x, y))
  | Thresh (e1,e2,e3,e4) ->
      if (eval (e1, x, y)) < (eval (e2, x, y))
      then eval (e3, x, y)
      else eval (e4, x, y)
  | OneOver e ->
      if (eval (e, x, y)) > 1.0 then 1.0 /. (eval (e, x, y)) else 1.0 /. 3.0
  | OneOverAvg (e1,e2,e3) ->
      if
        (((eval (e1, x, y)) +. (eval (e2, x, y))) +. (eval (e3, x, y))) > 1.0
      then
        1.0 /.
          (((eval (e1, x, y)) +. (eval (e2, x, y))) +. (eval (e3, x, y)))
      else (-1.0) /. 3.0;;

let rec ffor (low,high,f) =
  if low > high then () else (let _ = f low in ffor ((low + 1), high, f));;

let toIntensity z = int_of_float (127.5 +. (127.5 *. z));;

let toReal (i,n) = (float_of_int i) /. (float_of_int n);;

type expr =
  | VarX
  | VarY
  | Sine of expr
  | Cosine of expr
  | Average of expr* expr
  | Times of expr* expr
  | Thresh of expr* expr* expr* expr
  | OneOver of expr
  | OneOverAvg of expr* expr* expr;;

let buildAverage (e1,e2) = Average (e1, e2);;

let buildCosine e = Cosine e;;

let buildOneOver e = OneOver e;;

let buildOneOverAvg (e1,e2,e3) = OneOverAvg (e1, e2, e3);;

let buildSine e = Sine e;;

let buildThresh (a,b,a_less,b_less) = Thresh (a, b, a_less, b_less);;

let buildTimes (e1,e2) = Times (e1, e2);;

let buildX () = VarX;;

let buildY () = VarY;;

let rec build (rand,depth) =
  if depth <= 0
  then
    let randNum = rand (0, 2) in
    match randNum with | 0 -> buildX () | 1 -> buildY ()
  else
    (let randNum = rand (0, 9) in
     match randNum with
     | 0 -> build (rand, (depth - 1))
     | 1 -> build (rand, (depth - 1))
     | 2 -> buildSine (build (rand, (depth - 1)))
     | 3 -> buildCosine (build (rand, (depth - 1)))
     | 4 ->
         buildAverage
           ((build (rand, (depth - 1))), (build (rand, (depth - 1))))
     | 5 ->
         buildTimes
           ((build (rand, (depth - 1))), (build (rand, (depth - 1))))
     | 6 ->
         buildThresh
           ((build (rand, (depth - 1))), (build (rand, (depth - 1))),
             (build (rand, (depth - 1))), (build (rand, (depth - 1))))
     | 7 -> buildOneOver (build (rand, (depth - 1)))
     | 8 ->
         buildOneOverAvg
           ((build (rand, (depth - 1))), (build (rand, (depth - 1))),
             (build (rand, (depth - 1)))));;

let emitGrayscale (f,n,name) =
  let fname = "art_g_" ^ name in
  let chan = open_out (fname ^ ".pgm") in
  let n2p1 = (n * 2) + 1 in
  let _ = output_string chan (Format.sprintf "P5 %d %d 255\n" n2p1 n2p1) in
  let _ =
    ffor
      ((- n), n,
        (fun ix  ->
           ffor
             ((- n), n,
               (fun iy  ->
                  let x = toReal (ix, n) in
                  let y = toReal (iy, n) in
                  let z = f (x, y) in
                  let iz = toIntensity z in output_char chan (char_of_int iz))))) in
  close_out chan;
  ignore (Sys.command ("convert " ^ (fname ^ (".pgm " ^ (fname ^ ".jpg")))));
  ignore (Sys.command ("rm " ^ (fname ^ ".pgm")));;

let eval_fn e (x,y) =
  let rv = eval (e, x, y) in assert (((-1.0) <= rv) && (rv <= 1.0)); rv;;

let rec exprToString e =
  match e with
  | VarX  -> "x"
  | VarY  -> "y"
  | Sine e1 -> "sin(pi *" ^ ((exprToString e1) ^ ")")
  | Cosine e1 -> "cos(pi *" ^ ((exprToString e1) ^ ")")
  | Average (e1,e2) ->
      "((" ^ ((exprToString e1) ^ ("+" ^ ((exprToString e2) ^ ")/2)")))
  | Times (e1,e2) ->
      "(" ^ ((exprToString e1) ^ ("*" ^ ((exprToString e2) ^ ")")))
  | Thresh (e1,e2,e3,e4) ->
      "(" ^
        ((exprToString e1) ^
           ("<" ^
              ((exprToString e2) ^
                 ("?" ^
                    ((exprToString e3) ^ (":" ^ ((exprToString e4) ^ ")")))))))
  | OneOver e1 -> "(1/" ^ ((exprToString e1) ^ ")")
  | OneOverAvg (e1,e2,e3) ->
      "(1/((" ^
        ((exprToString e1) ^
           (" + " ^
              ((exprToString e2) ^ (" + " ^ ((exprToString e3) ^ ")/2))")))));;

let makeRand (seed1,seed2) =
  let seed = Array.of_list [seed1; seed2] in
  let s = Random.State.make seed in
  fun (x,y)  -> x + (Random.State.int s (y - x));;

let doRandomGray (depth,seed1,seed2) =
  let g = makeRand (seed1, seed2) in
  let e = build (g, depth) in
  let _ = print_string (exprToString e) in
  let f = eval_fn e in
  let n = 150 in
  let name = Format.sprintf "%d_%d_%d" depth seed1 seed2 in
  emitGrayscale (f, n, name);;

      else (-1.0) /. 3.0;;

let rec ffor (low,high,f) =
  if low > high then () else (let _ = f low in ffor ((low + 1), high, f));;

let toIntensity z = int_of_float (127.5 +. (127.5 *. z));;

let toReal (i,n) = (float_of_int i) /. (float_of_int n);;

type expr =
  | VarX
  | VarY
  | Sine of expr
  | Cosine of expr
  | Average of expr* expr
  | Times of expr* expr
  | Thresh of expr* expr* expr* expr
  | OneOver of expr
  | OneOverAvg of expr* expr* expr;;

let buildAverage (e1,e2) = Average (e1, e2);;

let buildCosine e = Cosine e;;

let buildOneOver e = OneOver e;;

let buildOneOverAvg (e1,e2,e3) = OneOverAvg (e1, e2, e3);;

let buildSine e = Sine e;;

let buildThresh (a,b,a_less,b_less) = Thresh (a, b, a_less, b_less);;

let buildTimes (e1,e2) = Times (e1, e2);;

let buildX () = VarX;;

let buildY () = VarY;;

let rec build (rand,depth) =
  if depth <= 0
  then
    let randNum = rand (0, 2) in
    match randNum with | 0 -> buildX () | 1 -> buildY ()
  else
    (let randNum = rand (0, 9) in
     match randNum with
     | 0 -> build (rand, (depth - 1))
     | 1 -> build (rand, (depth - 1))
     | 2 -> buildSine (build (rand, (depth - 1)))
     | 3 -> buildCosine (build (rand, (depth - 1)))
     | 4 ->
         buildAverage
           ((build (rand, (depth - 1))), (build (rand, (depth - 1))))
     | 5 ->
         buildTimes
           ((build (rand, (depth - 1))), (build (rand, (depth - 1))))
     | 6 ->
         buildThresh
           ((build (rand, (depth - 1))), (build (rand, (depth - 1))),
             (build (rand, (depth - 1))), (build (rand, (depth - 1))))
     | 7 -> buildOneOver (build (rand, (depth - 1)))
     | 8 ->
         buildOneOverAvg
           ((build (rand, (depth - 1))), (build (rand, (depth - 1))),
             (build (rand, (depth - 1)))));;

let emitColor (f1,f2,f3,n,name) =
  let fname = "art_c_" ^ name in
  let chan = open_out (fname ^ ".ppm") in
  let n2p1 = (n * 2) + 1 in
  let _ = output_string chan (Format.sprintf "P6 %d %d 255\n" n2p1 n2p1) in
  let _ =
    ffor
      ((- n), n,
        (fun ix  ->
           ffor
             ((- n), n,
               (fun iy  ->
                  let x = toReal (ix, n) in
                  let y = toReal (iy, n) in
                  let z1 = f1 (x, y) in
                  let z2 = f2 (x, y) in
                  let z3 = f3 (x, y) in
                  let iz1 = toIntensity z1 in
                  let iz2 = toIntensity z2 in
                  let iz3 = toIntensity z3 in
                  output_char chan (char_of_int iz1);
                  output_char chan (char_of_int iz2);
                  output_char chan (char_of_int iz3))))) in
  close_out chan;
  ignore (Sys.command ("convert " ^ (fname ^ (".ppm  " ^ (fname ^ ".jpg")))));
  ignore (Sys.command ("rm " ^ (fname ^ ".ppm")));;

let eval_fn e (x,y) =
  let rv = eval (e, x, y) in assert (((-1.0) <= rv) && (rv <= 1.0)); rv;;

let rec exprToString e =
  match e with
  | VarX  -> "x"
  | VarY  -> "y"
  | Sine e1 -> "sin(pi *" ^ ((exprToString e1) ^ ")")
  | Cosine e1 -> "cos(pi *" ^ ((exprToString e1) ^ ")")
  | Average (e1,e2) ->
      "((" ^ ((exprToString e1) ^ ("+" ^ ((exprToString e2) ^ ")/2)")))
  | Times (e1,e2) ->
      "(" ^ ((exprToString e1) ^ ("*" ^ ((exprToString e2) ^ ")")))
  | Thresh (e1,e2,e3,e4) ->
      "(" ^
        ((exprToString e1) ^
           ("<" ^
              ((exprToString e2) ^
                 ("?" ^
                    ((exprToString e3) ^ (":" ^ ((exprToString e4) ^ ")")))))))
  | OneOver e1 -> "(1/" ^ ((exprToString e1) ^ ")")
  | OneOverAvg (e1,e2,e3) ->
      "(1/((" ^
        ((exprToString e1) ^
           (" + " ^
              ((exprToString e2) ^ (" + " ^ ((exprToString e3) ^ ")/2))")))));;

let makeRand (seed1,seed2) =
  let seed = Array.of_list [seed1; seed2] in
  let s = Random.State.make seed in
  fun (x,y)  -> x + (Random.State.int s (y - x));;

let doRandomColor (depth,seed1,seed2) =
  let g = makeRand (seed1, seed2) in

  let e2 = build (g, depth) in

  let _ = Format.printf "red   = %s \n" (exprToString e1) in

  let _ = Format.printf "blue  = %s \n" (exprToString e3) in

  let f2 = eval_fn e2 in
  let f3 = eval_fn e3 in
  let n = 150 in
  let name = Format.sprintf "%d_%d_%d" depth seed1 seed2 in
  emitColor (f1, f2, f3, n, name);;

let removeDuplicates l = 
  let rec helper (seen,rest) = 
    match rest with 
      | []   -> seen
      | h::t -> 
          let seen' = if (List.mem h seen) = true then seen else [h]@seen in
          let rest' = t in 
            helper (seen',rest') 
  in
    List.rev (helper ([],l));;

    | Cosine   of expr
    | Average  of expr * expr
    | Times    of expr * expr
    | Thresh   of expr * expr * expr * expr	
    | OneOver  of expr
    | OneOverAvg of expr * expr * expr

let rec exprToString e = 
  match e with
    | VarX		    -> "x"
    | VarY		    -> "y"
    | Sine e1	    -> "sin(pi *" ^ exprToString e1 ^ ")"
    | Cosine e1	    -> "cos(pi *" ^ exprToString e1 ^ ")"
    | Average (e1, e2)  -> "((" ^ exprToString e1 ^ "+"^ exprToString e2 ^")/2)"
    | Times (e1, e2)    -> "(" ^ exprToString e1 ^ "*" ^ exprToString e2^")"
    | Thresh (e1, e2, e3, e4) -> "("^ exprToString e1 ^"<"^ exprToString e2 ^
                                 "?"^ exprToString e3 ^":"^ exprToString e4 ^ ")"
    | OneOver e1	    -> "(1/" ^ exprToString e1 ^ ")"
    | OneOverAvg (e1,e2,e3) -> "(1/((" ^ exprToString e1 ^ " + " ^ 
                               exprToString e2 ^ " + " 
                               ^ exprToString e3 ^ ")/2))"

let buildCosine(e)                 = Cosine(e)
let buildAverage(e1,e2)            = Average(e1,e2)
let buildTimes(e1,e2)              = Times(e1,e2)
let buildThresh(a,b,a_less,b_less) = Thresh(a,b,a_less,b_less)
let buildOneOver(e)		   = OneOver(e)
let buildOneOverAvg(e1,e2,e3)      = OneOverAvg(e1,e2,e3)


let pi = 4.0 *. atan 1.0

(*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX
XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)

let rec eval (e,x,y) = 
  match e with
    | VarX		      -> x
    | VarY		      -> y
    | Sine e1	      -> sin(pi *. (eval(e1,x,y)))
    | Cosine e1	      -> cos(pi *. (eval(e1,x,y)))
    | Average (e1,e2)     -> (eval(e1,x,y) +. eval(e2,x,y)) /. 2.0
    | Times (e1, e2)      -> (eval(e1,x,y) *. eval(e2,x,y))
    | Thresh (e1,e2,e3,e4) -> if (eval(e1,x,y) < eval(e2,x,y)) then eval(e3,x,y)				      else eval(e4,x,y);
    | OneOver(e)	      -> if eval(e,x,y) > 1.0 then 1.0/.eval(e,x,y) 
        else 1.0/.3.0;
    | OneOverAvg(e1,e2,e3) -> if (eval(e1,x,y) +. eval(e2,x,y) +. eval(e3,x,y)) > 1.0
        then 1.0/.(eval(e1,x,y) +. eval(e2,x,y) +. eval(e3,x,y)) else -1.0/.3.0;;

XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)



let eval_fn e (x,y) = 
  let rv = eval (e,x,y) in
    assert (-1.0 <= rv && rv <= 1.0);
    rv

let prefix130 = "130" (*XXXXXXXX*)
let print130 s = print_string (prefix130^">>"^s)

exception ErrorCode of string

exception TestException

type result = Pass | Fail | ErrorCode of string

let score = ref 0
let max = ref 0
let timeout = 300

let runWTimeout (f,arg,out,time) = 
  try if compare (f arg) out = 0 then Pass else Fail
  with e -> (print130 ("Uncaught Exception: "^(Printexc.to_string e)); ErrorCode "exception") 

let testTest () =
  let testGood x = 1 in
  let testBad x = 0 in 
  let testException x = raise TestException in
  let rec testTimeout x = testTimeout x in
    runWTimeout(testGood,0,1,5) = Pass &&  
    runWTimeout(testBad,0,1,5) = Fail &&  
    runWTimeout(testException,0,1,5) = ErrorCode "exception" && 
    runWTimeout(testTimeout,0,1,5) = ErrorCode "timeout"

let runTest ((f,arg,out),points,name) =
  let _   = max := !max + points in
  let outs = 
    match runWTimeout(f,arg,out,timeout) with 
        Pass -> (score := !score + points; "[pass]")
      | Fail -> "[fail]"
      | ErrorCode e -> "[error: "^e^"]"  in
    name^" "^outs^" ("^(string_of_int points)^")\n"

let explode s = 
  let rec _exp i = 
    if i >= String.length s then [] else (s.[i])::(_exp (i+1)) in
    _exp 0

let implode cs = 
  String.concat "" (List.map (String.make 1) cs)

let drop_paren s = 
  implode (List.filter (fun c -> not (List.mem c ['(';' ';')'])) (explode s))

let eq_real p (r1,r2) = 
  (r1 -. r2) < p || (r2 -. r1) < p

let mkTest f x y name = runTest ((f, x, y), 1, name)

let pi = 4.0 *. (atan 1.0);;

let rec eval (e,x,y) =
  match e with
  | VarX  -> x
  | VarY  -> y
  | Sine e1 -> sin (pi *. (eval (e1, x, y)))
  | Cosine e1 -> cos (pi *. (eval (e1, x, y)))
  | Average (e1,e2) -> ((eval (e1, x, y)) +. (eval (e2, x, y))) /. 2.0
  | Times (e1,e2) -> (eval (e1, x, y)) *. (eval (e2, x, y))
  | Thresh (e1,e2,e3,e4) ->
      if (eval (e1, x, y)) < (eval (e2, x, y))
      then eval (e3, x, y)
      else eval (e4, x, y)
  | OneOver e ->
      if (eval (e, x, y)) > 1.0 then 1.0 /. (eval (e, x, y)) else 1.0 /. 3.0
  | OneOverAvg (e1,e2,e3) ->
      if
        (((eval (e1, x, y)) +. (eval (e2, x, y))) +. (eval (e3, x, y))) > 1.0
      then
        1.0 /.
          (((eval (e1, x, y)) +. (eval (e2, x, y))) +. (eval (e3, x, y)))
      else (-1.0) /. 3.0;;

let rec ffor (low,high,f) =
  if low > high then () else (let _ = f low in ffor ((low + 1), high, f));;

let toIntensity z = int_of_float (127.5 +. (127.5 *. z));;

let toReal (i,n) = (float_of_int i) /. (float_of_int n);;

type expr =
  | VarX
  | VarY
  | Sine of expr
  | Cosine of expr
  | Average of expr* expr
  | Times of expr* expr
  | Thresh of expr* expr* expr* expr
  | OneOver of expr
  | OneOverAvg of expr* expr* expr;;

let buildAverage (e1,e2) = Average (e1, e2);;

let buildCosine e = Cosine e;;

let buildOneOver e = OneOver e;;

let buildOneOverAvg (e1,e2,e3) = OneOverAvg (e1, e2, e3);;

let buildSine e = Sine e;;

let buildThresh (a,b,a_less,b_less) = Thresh (a, b, a_less, b_less);;

let buildTimes (e1,e2) = Times (e1, e2);;

let buildX () = VarX;;

let buildY () = VarY;;

let rec build (rand,depth) =
  if depth <= 0
  then
    let randNum = rand (0, 2) in
    match randNum with | 0 -> buildX () | 1 -> buildY ()
  else
    (let randNum = rand (0, 9) in
     match randNum with
     | 0 -> build (rand, (depth - 1))
     | 1 -> build (rand, (depth - 1))
     | 2 -> buildSine (build (rand, (depth - 1)))
     | 3 -> buildCosine (build (rand, (depth - 1)))
     | 4 ->
         buildAverage
           ((build (rand, (depth - 1))), (build (rand, (depth - 1))))
     | 5 ->
         buildTimes
           ((build (rand, (depth - 1))), (build (rand, (depth - 1))))
     | 6 ->
         buildThresh
           ((build (rand, (depth - 1))), (build (rand, (depth - 1))),
             (build (rand, (depth - 1))), (build (rand, (depth - 1))))
     | 7 -> buildOneOver (build (rand, (depth - 1)))
     | 8 ->

let emitGrayscale (f,n,name) =
  let fname = "art_g_" ^ name in
  let chan = open_out (fname ^ ".pgm") in
  let n2p1 = (n * 2) + 1 in
  let _ = output_string chan (Format.sprintf "P5 %d %d 255\n" n2p1 n2p1) in
  let _ =
    ffor
      ((- n), n,
        (fun ix  ->
           ffor
             ((- n), n,
               (fun iy  ->
                  let x = toReal (ix, n) in
                  let y = toReal (iy, n) in

  ignore (Sys.command ("rm " ^ (fname ^ ".pgm")));;

let eval_fn e (x,y) =
  let rv = eval (e, x, y) in assert (((-1.0) <= rv) && (rv <= 1.0)); rv;;

let rec exprToString e =
  match e with
  | VarX  -> "x"
  | VarY  -> "y"
  | Sine e1 -> "sin(pi *" ^ ((exprToString e1) ^ ")")
  | Cosine e1 -> "cos(pi *" ^ ((exprToString e1) ^ ")")
  | Average (e1,e2) ->
      "((" ^ ((exprToString e1) ^ ("+" ^ ((exprToString e2) ^ ")/2)")))
  | Times (e1,e2) ->
      "(" ^ ((exprToString e1) ^ ("*" ^ ((exprToString e2) ^ ")")))
  | Thresh (e1,e2,e3,e4) ->
      "(" ^
        ((exprToString e1) ^
           ("<" ^
              ((exprToString e2) ^
                 ("?" ^
                    ((exprToString e3) ^ (":" ^ ((exprToString e4) ^ ")")))))))
  | OneOver e1 -> "(1/" ^ ((exprToString e1) ^ ")")
  | OneOverAvg (e1,e2,e3) ->
      "(1/((" ^
        ((exprToString e1) ^
           (" + " ^
              ((exprToString e2) ^ (" + " ^ ((exprToString e3) ^ ")/2))")))));;

  let seed = Array.of_list [seed1; seed2] in
  let s = Random.State.make seed in
  fun (x,y)  -> x + (Random.State.int s (y - x));;

  let f = eval_fn e in
  let n = 150 in
  let name = Format.sprintf "%d_%d_%d" depth seed1 seed2 in
  emitGrayscale (f, n, name);;

                 ("?" ^
                    ((exprToString e3) ^ (":" ^ ((exprToString e4) ^ ")")))))))
  | OneOver e1 -> "(1/" ^ ((exprToString e1) ^ ")")
  | OneOverAvg (e1,e2,e3) ->
      "(1/((" ^
        ((exprToString e1) ^
           (" + " ^
              ((exprToString e2) ^ (" + " ^ ((exprToString e3) ^ ")/2))")))));;

let testTest () =
let testGood x = 1 in
let testBad x = 0 in 
let testException x = raise TestException in
let rec testTimeout x = testTimeout x in
runWTimeout(testGood,0,1,5) = Pass &&  
runWTimeout(testBad,0,1,5) = Fail &&  
runWTimeout(testException,0,1,5) = ErrorCode "exception" && 
runWTimeout(testTimeout,0,1,5) = ErrorCode "timeout"

let runTest ((f,arg,out),points,name) =
let _   = max := !max + points in
let outs = 
match runWTimeout(f,arg,out,timeout) with 
Pass -> (score := !score + points; "[pass]")
| Fail -> "[fail]"
| ErrorCode e -> "[error: "^e^"]"  in
name^" "^outs^" ("^(string_of_int points)^")\n"

let removeDuplicates l = 
  let rec helper (seen,rest) = 
    match rest with 
      | []   -> seen
      | h::t -> 
          let seen' = if (List.mem h seen) = true then seen else [h]@seen in
          let rest' = t in 
            helper (seen',rest') 
  in
    List.rev (helper ([],l));;

type expr = 
      VarX
    | VarY
    | Sine     of expr
    | Cosine   of expr
    | Average  of expr * expr
    | Times    of expr * expr
    | Thresh   of expr * expr * expr * expr	
    | OneOver  of expr
    | OneOverAvg of expr * expr * expr

(*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX
XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX
*)
let rec exprToString e = 
  match e with
    | VarX		    -> "x"
    | VarY		    -> "y"
    | Sine e1	    -> "sin(pi *" ^ exprToString e1 ^ ")"
    | Cosine e1	    -> "cos(pi *" ^ exprToString e1 ^ ")"
    | Average (e1, e2)  -> "((" ^ exprToString e1 ^ "+"^ exprToString e2 ^")/2)"
    | Times (e1, e2)    -> "(" ^ exprToString e1 ^ "*" ^ exprToString e2^")"
    | Thresh (e1, e2, e3, e4) -> "("^ exprToString e1 ^"<"^ exprToString e2 ^
                                 "?"^ exprToString e3 ^":"^ exprToString e4 ^ ")"
    | OneOver e1	    -> "(1/" ^ exprToString e1 ^ ")"
    | OneOverAvg (e1,e2,e3) -> "(1/((" ^ exprToString e1 ^ " + " ^ 
                               exprToString e2 ^ " + " 
                               ^ exprToString e3 ^ ")/2))"


(*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)

let sampleExpr1 = Thresh(VarX,VarY,VarX,(Times(Sine(VarX),Cosine(Average(VarX,VarY)))));;

let _ = exprToString sampleExpr1

XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX
XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX
XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)

let buildX()                       = VarX
let buildY()                       = VarY
let buildSine(e)                   = Sine(e)
let buildCosine(e)                 = Cosine(e)
let buildAverage(e1,e2)            = Average(e1,e2)
let buildTimes(e1,e2)              = Times(e1,e2)
let buildThresh(a,b,a_less,b_less) = Thresh(a,b,a_less,b_less)
let buildOneOver(e)		   = OneOver(e)
let buildOneOverAvg(e1,e2,e3)      = OneOverAvg(e1,e2,e3)


let pi = 4.0 *. atan 1.0

(*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX
XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)

let rec eval (e,x,y) = 
  match e with
    | VarX		      -> x
    | VarY		      -> y
    | Sine e1	      -> sin(pi *. (eval(e1,x,y)))
    | Cosine e1	      -> cos(pi *. (eval(e1,x,y)))
    | Average (e1,e2)     -> (eval(e1,x,y) +. eval(e2,x,y)) /. 2.0
    | Times (e1, e2)      -> (eval(e1,x,y) *. eval(e2,x,y))
    | Thresh (e1,e2,e3,e4) -> if (eval(e1,x,y) < eval(e2,x,y)) then eval(e3,x,y)				      else eval(e4,x,y);
    | OneOver(e)	      -> if eval(e,x,y) > 1.0 then 1.0/.eval(e,x,y) 
        else 1.0/.3.0;
    | OneOverAvg(e1,e2,e3) -> if (eval(e1,x,y) +. eval(e2,x,y) +. eval(e3,x,y)) > 1.0
        then 1.0/.(eval(e1,x,y) +. eval(e2,x,y) +. eval(e3,x,y)) else -1.0/.3.0;;


(*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX
XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX
XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX
XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)



let eval_fn e (x,y) = 
  let rv = eval (e,x,y) in
    assert (-1.0 <= rv && rv <= 1.0);
    rv

let sampleExpr =

                                                              buildX()),buildTimes(buildCosine (buildCosine (buildAverage
                                                                                                               (buildTimes (buildY(),buildY()),buildCosine (buildX())))),
                                                                                   buildCosine (buildTimes (buildSine (buildCosine
                                                                                                                         (buildY())),buildAverage (buildSine (buildX()), buildTimes
                                                                                                                                                                           (buildX(),buildX()))))))),buildY())))

XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX

let rec build (rand, depth) = 
  if depth <= 0 then
    let randNum = rand(0,2) in
      match randNum with
        | 0   -> buildX()
        | 1   -> buildY()
  else
    let randNum = rand(0,9) in
      match randNum with
        | 0   -> build(rand, depth - 1)
        | 1   -> build(rand, depth - 1)
        | 2   -> buildSine(build(rand, depth - 1))
        | 3   -> buildCosine(build(rand, depth - 1))
        | 4   -> buildAverage(build(rand, depth - 1), build(rand, depth - 1))
        | 5   -> buildTimes(build(rand, depth - 1), build(rand, depth - 1))
        | 6   -> buildThresh(build(rand, depth - 1), build(rand, depth - 1),
                             build(rand, depth - 1), build(rand, depth - 1))
        | 7   -> buildOneOver(build(rand, depth - 1))
        | 8   -> buildOneOverAvg(build(rand, depth - 1), build(rand, depth - 1),
                                 build(rand, depth - 1));;

type result = Pass | Fail | ErrorCode of string

let score = ref 0
let max = ref 0
let timeout = 300

let runWTimeout (f,arg,out,time) = 
  try if compare (f arg) out = 0 then Pass else Fail
  with e -> (print130 ("Uncaught Exception: "^(Printexc.to_string e)); ErrorCode "exception") 

let testTest () =
  let testGood x = 1 in
  let testBad x = 0 in 
  let testException x = raise TestException in
  let rec testTimeout x = testTimeout x in
    runWTimeout(testGood,0,1,5) = Pass &&  
    runWTimeout(testBad,0,1,5) = Fail &&  
    runWTimeout(testException,0,1,5) = ErrorCode "exception" && 
    runWTimeout(testTimeout,0,1,5) = ErrorCode "timeout"

let runTest ((f,arg,out),points,name) =
  let _   = max := !max + points in
  let outs = 
    match runWTimeout(f,arg,out,timeout) with 
        Pass -> (score := !score + points; "[pass]")
      | Fail -> "[fail]"
      | ErrorCode e -> "[error: "^e^"]"  in
    name^" "^outs^" ("^(string_of_int points)^")\n"

(*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
let explode s = 
  let rec _exp i = 
    if i >= String.length s then [] else (s.[i])::(_exp (i+1)) in
    _exp 0

let implode cs = 
  String.concat "" (List.map (String.make 1) cs)

let drop_paren s = 
  implode (List.filter (fun c -> not (List.mem c ['(';' ';')'])) (explode s))

let eq_real p (r1,r2) = 
  (r1 -. r2) < p || (r2 -. r1) < p

let mkTest f x y name = runTest ((f, x, y), 1, name)

let badTest () = "WARNING: Your tests are not valid!!\n"

let scoreMsg () = 
  Format.sprintf "Results: Score/Max = %d / %d \n" !score !max

let doTest f = 
  try f () with ex -> 
    Format.sprintf "WARNING: INVALID TEST THROWS EXCEPTION!!: %s \n\n"
      (Printexc.to_string ex)

let _ =
  let report = List.map doTest sampleTests                in
  let _      = List.iter print130 (report@([scoreMsg()])) in
  let _      = print130 ("Compiled\n")                    in
    (!score, !max)

let emitGrayscale (f,n,name) =
(* Open the output file and write the header *)
let fname  = ("art_g_"^name) in
let chan = open_out (fname^".pgm") in
(* Picture will be 2*N+1 pixels on a side *)
let n2p1 = n*2+1 in   
let _ = output_string chan (Format.sprintf "P5 %d %d 255\n" n2p1 n2p1) in
let _ = 
ffor (-n, n, 
fun ix ->
ffor (-n, n, 
fun iy ->
(* Convert grid locations to [-1,1] *)
let x = toReal(ix,n) in
let y = toReal(iy,n) in
(* Apply the given random function *)
let z = f (x,y) in
(* Convert the result to a grayscale value *)
let iz = toIntensity(z) in
(* Emit one byte for this pixel *)
output_char chan (char_of_int iz))) in 
close_out chan;
ignore(Sys.command ("convert "^fname^".pgm "^fname^".jpg"));
ignore(Sys.command ("rm "^fname^".pgm"))

let f = eval_fn e in
(* 301 x 301 pixels *)

(* Emit the picture *)

emitGrayscale (f,n,name)

let pi = 4.0 *. (atan 1.0);;

let rec eval (e,x,y) =
  match e with
  | VarX  -> x
  | VarY  -> y
  | Sine e1 -> sin (pi *. (eval (e1, x, y)))
  | Cosine e1 -> cos (pi *. (eval (e1, x, y)))
  | Average (e1,e2) -> ((eval (e1, x, y)) +. (eval (e2, x, y))) /. 2.0
  | Times (e1,e2) -> (eval (e1, x, y)) *. (eval (e2, x, y))
  | Thresh (e1,e2,e3,e4) ->
      if (eval (e1, x, y)) < (eval (e2, x, y))
      then eval (e3, x, y)
      else eval (e4, x, y)
  | OneOver e ->
      if (eval (e, x, y)) > 1.0 then 1.0 /. (eval (e, x, y)) else 1.0 /. 3.0
  | OneOverAvg (e1,e2,e3) ->
      if
        (((eval (e1, x, y)) +. (eval (e2, x, y))) +. (eval (e3, x, y))) > 1.0
      then
        1.0 /.
          (((eval (e1, x, y)) +. (eval (e2, x, y))) +. (eval (e3, x, y)))
      else (-1.0) /. 3.0;;

let rec ffor (low,high,f) =
  if low > high then () else (let _ = f low in ffor ((low + 1), high, f));;

let toIntensity z = int_of_float (127.5 +. (127.5 *. z));;

let toReal (i,n) = (float_of_int i) /. (float_of_int n);;

type expr =
  | VarX
  | VarY
  | Sine of expr
  | Cosine of expr
  | Average of expr* expr
  | Times of expr* expr
  | Thresh of expr* expr* expr* expr
  | OneOver of expr
  | OneOverAvg of expr* expr* expr;;

let buildAverage (e1,e2) = Average (e1, e2);;

let buildCosine e = Cosine e;;

let buildOneOver e = OneOver e;;

let buildOneOverAvg (e1,e2,e3) = OneOverAvg (e1, e2, e3);;

let buildSine e = Sine e;;

let buildThresh (a,b,a_less,b_less) = Thresh (a, b, a_less, b_less);;

let buildTimes (e1,e2) = Times (e1, e2);;

let buildX () = VarX;;

let buildY () = VarY;;

let rec build (rand,depth) =
  if depth <= 0
  then
    let randNum = rand (0, 2) in
    match randNum with | 0 -> buildX () | 1 -> buildY ()
  else
    (let randNum = rand (0, 9) in
     match randNum with
     | 0 -> build (rand, (depth - 1))
     | 1 -> build (rand, (depth - 1))
     | 2 -> buildSine (build (rand, (depth - 1)))
     | 3 -> buildCosine (build (rand, (depth - 1)))
     | 4 ->
         buildAverage
           ((build (rand, (depth - 1))), (build (rand, (depth - 1))))
     | 5 ->
         buildTimes
           ((build (rand, (depth - 1))), (build (rand, (depth - 1))))
     | 6 ->
         buildThresh
           ((build (rand, (depth - 1))), (build (rand, (depth - 1))),
             (build (rand, (depth - 1))), (build (rand, (depth - 1))))
     | 7 -> buildOneOver (build (rand, (depth - 1)))
     | 8 ->
         buildOneOverAvg
           ((build (rand, (depth - 1))), (build (rand, (depth - 1))),
             (build (rand, (depth - 1)))));;

let emitGrayscale (f,n,name) =
  let fname = "art_g_" ^ name in
  let chan = open_out (fname ^ ".pgm") in
  let n2p1 = (n * 2) + 1 in
  let _ = output_string chan (Format.sprintf "P5 %d %d 255\n" n2p1 n2p1) in
  let _ =
    ffor
      ((- n), n,
        (fun ix  ->
           ffor
             ((- n), n,
               (fun iy  ->
                  let x = toReal (ix, n) in
                  let y = toReal (iy, n) in
                  let z = f (x, y) in
                  let iz = toIntensity z in output_char chan (char_of_int iz))))) in
  close_out chan;
  ignore (Sys.command ("convert " ^ (fname ^ (".pgm " ^ (fname ^ ".jpg")))));
  ignore (Sys.command ("rm " ^ (fname ^ ".pgm")));;

let eval_fn e (x,y) =
  let rv = eval (e, x, y) in assert (((-1.0) <= rv) && (rv <= 1.0)); rv;;

let rec exprToString e =
  match e with
  | VarX  -> "x"
  | VarY  -> "y"
  | Sine e1 -> "sin(pi *" ^ ((exprToString e1) ^ ")")
  | Cosine e1 -> "cos(pi *" ^ ((exprToString e1) ^ ")")
  | Average (e1,e2) ->
      "((" ^ ((exprToString e1) ^ ("+" ^ ((exprToString e2) ^ ")/2)")))
  | Times (e1,e2) ->
      "(" ^ ((exprToString e1) ^ ("*" ^ ((exprToString e2) ^ ")")))
  | Thresh (e1,e2,e3,e4) ->
      "(" ^
        ((exprToString e1) ^
           ("<" ^
              ((exprToString e2) ^
                 ("?" ^
                    ((exprToString e3) ^ (":" ^ ((exprToString e4) ^ ")")))))))
  | OneOver e1 -> "(1/" ^ ((exprToString e1) ^ ")")
  | OneOverAvg (e1,e2,e3) ->
      "(1/((" ^
        ((exprToString e1) ^
           (" + " ^
              ((exprToString e2) ^ (" + " ^ ((exprToString e3) ^ ")/2))")))));;

let makeRand (seed1,seed2) =
  let seed = Array.of_list [seed1; seed2] in
  let s = Random.State.make seed in
  fun (x,y)  -> x + (Random.State.int s (y - x));;

let doRandomGray (depth,seed1,seed2) =
  let g = makeRand (seed1, seed2) in
  let e = build (g, depth) in
  let _ = print_string (exprToString e) in
  let f = eval_fn e in
  let n = 150 in
  let name = Format.sprintf "%d_%d_%d" depth seed1 seed2 in
  emitGrayscale (f, n, name);;

let _ = 
ffor (-n, n, 
fun ix ->
ffor (-n, n, 
fun iy ->
(* Convert grid locations to [-1,1] *)
let x = toReal(ix,n) in
let y = toReal(iy,n) in
(* Apply the given random function *)
let z1 = f1 (x,y) in
let z2 = f2 (x,y) in
let z3 = f3 (x,y) in

(* Convert the result to a grayscale value *)
let iz1 = toIntensity(z1) in
let iz2 = toIntensity(z2) in
let iz3 = toIntensity(z3) in

(* Emit one byte per color for this pixel *)
output_char chan (char_of_int iz1);
output_char chan (char_of_int iz2);
output_char chan (char_of_int iz3);
)) in  
close_out chan;
ignore(Sys.command ("convert "^fname^".ppm  "^fname^".jpg"));
ignore(Sys.command ("rm "^fname^".ppm"))

let doRandomColor (depth,seed1,seed2) =
(* Initialize random-number generator g *)
let g = makeRand (seed1,seed2) in
(* Generate a random expression, and turn it into an ML function *)
let e1 = build (g, depth) in
let e2 = build (g, depth) in
let e3 = build (g, depth) in

let _ = Format.printf "red   = %s \n" (exprToString e1) in
let _ = Format.printf "green = %s \n" (exprToString e2) in
let _ = Format.printf "blue  = %s \n" (exprToString e3) in

let f1 = eval_fn e1 in
let f2 = eval_fn e2 in
let f3 = eval_fn e3 in

(* 301 x 301 pixels *)
let n = 150 in
(* Emit the picture *)
let name = Format.sprintf "%d_%d_%d" depth seed1 seed2 in
emitColor (f1,f2,f3,n,name)
type result = Pass | Fail | ErrorCode of string

let testTest () =
let testGood x = 1 in
let testBad x = 0 in 
let testException x = raise TestException in
let rec testTimeout x = testTimeout x in
runWTimeout(testGood,0,1,5) = Pass &&  
runWTimeout(testBad,0,1,5) = Fail &&  
runWTimeout(testException,0,1,5) = ErrorCode "exception" && 
runWTimeout(testTimeout,0,1,5) = ErrorCode "timeout"

let runTest ((f,arg,out),points,name) =
let _   = max := !max + points in
let outs = 
match runWTimeout(f,arg,out,timeout) with 
Pass -> (score := !score + points; "[pass]")
| Fail -> "[fail]"
| ErrorCode e -> "[error: "^e^"]"  in
name^" "^outs^" ("^(string_of_int points)^")\n"

let drop_paren s = 
implode (List.filter (fun c -> not (List.mem c ['(';' ';')'])) (explode s))

let eq_real p (r1,r2) = 
(r1 -. r2) < p || (r2 -. r1) < p
let mkTest f x y name = runTest ((f, x, y), 1, name)
let badTest () = "WARNING: Your tests are not valid!!\n"

let doTest f = 
try f () with ex -> 
Format.sprintf "WARNING: INVALID TEST THROWS EXCEPTION!!: %s \n\n"
(Printexc.to_string ex)

let _ =
let report = List.map doTest sampleTests                in
let _      = List.iter print130 (report@([scoreMsg()])) in
let _      = print130 ("Compiled\n")                    in
(!score, !max)

let removeDuplicates l = 
  let rec helper (seen,rest) = 
    match rest with 
      | []   -> seen
      | h::t -> 
          let seen' = if (List.mem h seen) = true then seen else [h]@seen in
          let rest' = t in 
            helper (seen',rest') 
  in
    List.rev (helper ([],l));;

let rec wwhile (f,b) = match f b with
  | (b', c) -> if c = true then wwhile (f, b') else b';;

let fixpoint (f,b) = wwhile ((fun fixb -> 
                               let b = (f fixb) in (b, b <> fixb)), b)

type expr = 
      VarX
    | VarY
    | Sine     of expr
    | Cosine   of expr
    | Average  of expr * expr
    | Times    of expr * expr
    | Thresh   of expr * expr * expr * expr	
    | OneOver  of expr
    | OneOverAvg of expr * expr * expr

(*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX
XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX
*)
let rec exprToString e = 
  match e with
    | VarX		    -> "x"
    | VarY		    -> "y"
    | Sine e1	    -> "sin(pi *" ^ exprToString e1 ^ ")"
    | Cosine e1	    -> "cos(pi *" ^ exprToString e1 ^ ")"
    | Average (e1, e2)  -> "((" ^ exprToString e1 ^ "+"^ exprToString e2 ^")/2)"
    | Times (e1, e2)    -> "(" ^ exprToString e1 ^ "*" ^ exprToString e2^")"
    | Thresh (e1, e2, e3, e4) -> "("^ exprToString e1 ^"<"^ exprToString e2 ^
                                 "?"^ exprToString e3 ^":"^ exprToString e4 ^ ")"
    | OneOver e1	    -> "(1/" ^ exprToString e1 ^ ")"
    | OneOverAvg (e1,e2,e3) -> "(1/((" ^ exprToString e1 ^ " + " ^ 
                               exprToString e2 ^ " + " 
                               ^ exprToString e3 ^ ")/2))"


(*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)

let sampleExpr1 = Thresh(VarX,VarY,VarX,(Times(Sine(VarX),Cosine(Average(VarX,VarY)))));;

let _ = exprToString sampleExpr1 




(*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX
XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX
XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX
XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)

let buildX()                       = VarX
let buildY()                       = VarY
let buildSine(e)                   = Sine(e)
let buildCosine(e)                 = Cosine(e)
let buildAverage(e1,e2)            = Average(e1,e2)
let buildTimes(e1,e2)              = Times(e1,e2)
let buildThresh(a,b,a_less,b_less) = Thresh(a,b,a_less,b_less)
let buildOneOver(e)		   = OneOver(e)
let buildOneOverAvg(e1,e2,e3)      = OneOverAvg(e1,e2,e3)


let pi = 4.0 *. atan 1.0

(*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX
XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)

let rec eval (e,x,y) = 
  match e with
    | VarX		      -> x
    | VarY		      -> y
    | Sine e1	      -> sin(pi *. (eval(e1,x,y)))
    | Cosine e1	      -> cos(pi *. (eval(e1,x,y)))
    | Average (e1,e2)     -> (eval(e1,x,y) +. eval(e2,x,y)) /. 2.0
    | Times (e1, e2)      -> (eval(e1,x,y) *. eval(e2,x,y))
    | Thresh (e1,e2,e3,e4) -> if (eval(e1,x,y) < eval(e2,x,y)) then eval(e3,x,y)				      else eval(e4,x,y);
    | OneOver(e)	      -> if eval(e,x,y) > 1.0 then 1.0/.eval(e,x,y) 
        else 1.0/.3.0;
    | OneOverAvg(e1,e2,e3) -> if (eval(e1,x,y) +. eval(e2,x,y) +. eval(e3,x,y)) > 1.0
        then 1.0/.(eval(e1,x,y) +. eval(e2,x,y) +. eval(e3,x,y)) else -1.0/.3.0;;


(*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX
XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX
XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX
XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)



let eval_fn e (x,y) = 
  let rv = eval (e,x,y) in
    assert (-1.0 <= rv && rv <= 1.0);
    rv

let sampleExpr =

                                                                                   buildCosine (buildTimes (buildSine (buildCosine
                                                                                                                         (buildY())),buildAverage (buildSine (buildX()), buildTimes
                                                                                                                                                                           (buildX(),buildX()))))))),buildY())))

let sampleExpr2 =

let rec build (rand, depth) = 
  if depth <= 0 then
    let randNum = rand(0,2) in
      match randNum with
        | 0   -> buildX()
        | 1   -> buildY()
  else
    let randNum = rand(0,9) in
      match randNum with
        | 0   -> build(rand, depth - 1)
        | 1   -> build(rand, depth - 1)
        | 2   -> buildSine(build(rand, depth - 1))
        | 3   -> buildCosine(build(rand, depth - 1))
        | 4   -> buildAverage(build(rand, depth - 1), build(rand, depth - 1))
        | 5   -> buildTimes(build(rand, depth - 1), build(rand, depth - 1))
        | 6   -> buildThresh(build(rand, depth - 1), build(rand, depth - 1),
                             build(rand, depth - 1), build(rand, depth - 1))
        | 7   -> buildOneOver(build(rand, depth - 1))
        | 8   -> buildOneOverAvg(build(rand, depth - 1), build(rand, depth - 1),
                                 build(rand, depth - 1));;

let makeRand (seed1, seed2) = 
  let seed = (Array.of_list [seed1;seed2]) in
  let s = Random.State.make seed in
    (fun (x,y) -> (x + (Random.State.int s (y-x))))


let rec rseq g r n =
  if n <= 0 then [] else (g r)::(rseq g r (n-1))

  if low > high then () else 
    let _ = f low in 
      ffor (low+1,high,f)

  (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
  let fname  = ("art_g_"^name) in

  (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)

  let _ = 
    ffor (-n, n, 
          fun ix ->
            ffor (-n, n, 
                  fun iy ->
                    (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
                    let x = toReal(ix,n) in
                    let y = toReal(iy,n) in
                    (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
                    let z = f (x,y) in
                    (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
                    let iz = toIntensity(z) in
                      (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
                      output_char chan (char_of_int iz))) in 
    close_out chan;
    ignore(Sys.command ("convert "^fname^".pgm "^fname^".jpg"));
    ignore(Sys.command ("rm "^fname^".pgm"))

let runWTimeout (f,arg,out,time) = 
  try if compare (f arg) out = 0 then Pass else Fail
  with e -> (print130 ("Uncaught Exception: "^(Printexc.to_string e)); ErrorCode "exception")

      | ErrorCode e -> "[error: "^e^"]"  in
    name^" "^outs^" ("^(string_of_int points)^")\n"

let explode s = 
  let rec _exp i = 
    if i >= String.length s then [] else (s.[i])::(_exp (i+1)) in
    _exp 0

let implode cs = 
  String.concat "" (List.map (String.make 1) cs)

let drop_paren s = 
  implode (List.filter (fun c -> not (List.mem c ['(';' ';')'])) (explode s))

let eq_real p (r1,r2) = 
  (r1 -. r2) < p || (r2 -. r1) < p

  let _      = print130 ("Compiled\n")                    in

let rec assoc (d,k,l) = match l with
| []	            -> d
| (name, num)::rest -> if k = name 
then num else assoc (d,k,rest)

let removeDuplicates l = 
let rec helper (seen,rest) = 
match rest with 
| []   -> seen
| h::t -> 
let seen' = if (List.mem h seen) = true then seen else [h]@seen in
let rest' = t in 
helper (seen',rest') 
in
List.rev (helper ([],l))

let rec wwhile (f,b) = match f b with
| (b', c) -> if c = true then wwhile (f, b') else b'

let rec exprToString e = 
match e with
| VarX		    -> "x"
| VarY		    -> "y"
| Sine e1	    -> "sin(pi *" ^ exprToString e1 ^ ")"
| Cosine e1	    -> "cos(pi *" ^ exprToString e1 ^ ")"
| Average (e1, e2)  -> "((" ^ exprToString e1 ^ "+"^ exprToString e2 ^")/2)"
| Times (e1, e2)    -> "(" ^ exprToString e1 ^ "*" ^ exprToString e2^")"
| Thresh (e1, e2, e3, e4) -> "("^ exprToString e1 ^"<"^ exprToString e2 ^
"?"^ exprToString e3 ^":"^ exprToString e4 ^ ")"
| OneOver e1	    -> "(1/" ^ exprToString e1 ^ ")"
| OneOverAvg (e1,e2,e3) -> "(1/((" ^ exprToString e1 ^ " + " ^ 
exprToString e2 ^ " + " 
^ exprToString e3 ^ ")/2))"

let rec eval (e,x,y) = 
match e with
| VarX		      -> x
| VarY		      -> y
| Sine e1	      -> sin(pi *. (eval(e1,x,y)))
| Cosine e1	      -> cos(pi *. (eval(e1,x,y)))
| Average (e1,e2)     -> (eval(e1,x,y) +. eval(e2,x,y)) /. 2.0
| Times (e1, e2)      -> (eval(e1,x,y) *. eval(e2,x,y))
| Thresh (e1,e2,e3,e4) -> if (eval(e1,x,y) < eval(e2,x,y)) then eval(e3,x,y)				      else eval(e4,x,y);
| OneOver(e)	      -> if eval(e,x,y) > 1.0 && eval(e,x,y) < -1.0 
then 1.0/.eval(e,x,y) 
else 1.0/.3.0;
| OneOverAvg(e1,e2,e3) -> if (eval(e1,x,y) +. eval(e2,x,y) +. eval(e3,x,y))			    > 1.0 && (eval(e1,x,y) +. eval(e2,x,y) +. eval(e3,x,y))			    < -1.0 
then 1.0/.(eval(e1,x,y) +. eval(e2,x,y) +. eval(e3,x,y)) else -1.0/.3.0

let rec build (rand, depth) = 
if depth <= 0 then
let randNum = rand(0,2) in
match randNum with
| 0   -> buildX()
| 1   -> buildY()
else
let randNum = rand(0,9) in
match randNum with
| 0   -> build(rand, depth - 1)
| 1   -> build(rand, depth - 1)
| 2   -> buildSine(build(rand, depth - 1))
| 3   -> buildCosine(build(rand, depth - 1))
| 4   -> buildAverage(build(rand, depth - 1), build(rand, depth - 1))
| 5   -> buildTimes(build(rand, depth - 1), build(rand, depth - 1))
| 6   -> buildThresh(build(rand, depth - 1), build(rand, depth - 1),
build(rand, depth - 1), build(rand, depth - 1))
| 7   -> buildOneOver(build(rand, depth - 1))
| 8   -> buildOneOverAvg(build(rand, depth - 1), build(rand, depth - 1),
build(rand, depth - 1))

let s = Random.State.make seed in
(fun (x,y) -> (x + (Random.State.int s (y-x))))

let emitGrayscale (f,n,name) =
(* Open the output file and write the header *)
let fname  = ("art_g_"^name) in
let chan = open_out (fname^".pgm") in
(* Picture will be 2*N+1 pixels on a side *)
let n2p1 = n*2+1 in   
let _ = output_string chan (Format.sprintf "P5 %d %d 255\n" n2p1 n2p1) in
let _ = 
ffor (-n, n, 
fun ix ->
ffor (-n, n, 
fun iy ->
(* Convert grid locations to [-1,1] *)
let x = toReal(ix,n) in
let y = toReal(iy,n) in
(* Apply the given random function *)
let z = f (x,y) in
(* Convert the result to a grayscale value *)
let iz = toIntensity(z) in
(* Emit one byte for this pixel *)
output_char chan (char_of_int iz))) in 
close_out chan;
ignore(Sys.command ("convert "^fname^".pgm "^fname^".jpg"));
ignore(Sys.command ("rm "^fname^".pgm"))

let doRandomGray (depth,seed1,seed2) =
(* Initialize random-number generator g *)
let g = makeRand(seed1,seed2) in
(* Generate a random expression, and turn it into an ML function *)
let e = build (g,depth) in
let _ = print_string (exprToString e) in
let f = eval_fn e in
(* 301 x 301 pixels *)
let n = 150 in
(* Emit the picture *)
let name = Format.sprintf "%d_%d_%d" depth seed1 seed2 in
emitGrayscale (f,n,name)

let pi = 4.0 *. (atan 1.0);;

let rec eval (e,x,y) =
  match e with
  | VarX  -> x
  | VarY  -> y
  | Sine e1 -> sin (pi *. (eval (e1, x, y)))
  | Cosine e1 -> cos (pi *. (eval (e1, x, y)))
  | Average (e1,e2) -> ((eval (e1, x, y)) +. (eval (e2, x, y))) /. 2.0
  | Times (e1,e2) -> (eval (e1, x, y)) *. (eval (e2, x, y))
  | Thresh (e1,e2,e3,e4) ->
      if (eval (e1, x, y)) < (eval (e2, x, y))
      then eval (e3, x, y)
      else eval (e4, x, y)
  | OneOver e ->
      if ((eval (e, x, y)) > 1.0) && ((eval (e, x, y)) < (-1.0))
      then 1.0 /. (eval (e, x, y))
      else 1.0 /. 3.0
  | OneOverAvg (e1,e2,e3) ->
      if
        ((((eval (e1, x, y)) +. (eval (e2, x, y))) +. (eval (e3, x, y))) >
           1.0)
          &&
          ((((eval (e1, x, y)) +. (eval (e2, x, y))) +. (eval (e3, x, y))) <
             (-1.0))
      then
        1.0 /.
          (((eval (e1, x, y)) +. (eval (e2, x, y))) +. (eval (e3, x, y)))
      else (-1.0) /. 3.0;;

let rec ffor (low,high,f) =
  if low > high then () else (let _ = f low in ffor ((low + 1), high, f));;

let toIntensity z = int_of_float (127.5 +. (127.5 *. z));;

let toReal (i,n) = (float_of_int i) /. (float_of_int n);;

type expr =
  | VarX
  | VarY
  | Sine of expr
  | Cosine of expr
  | Average of expr* expr
  | Times of expr* expr
  | Thresh of expr* expr* expr* expr
  | OneOver of expr
  | OneOverAvg of expr* expr* expr;;

let buildAverage (e1,e2) = Average (e1, e2);;

let buildCosine e = Cosine e;;

let buildOneOver e = OneOver e;;

let buildOneOverAvg (e1,e2,e3) = OneOverAvg (e1, e2, e3);;

let buildSine e = Sine e;;

let buildThresh (a,b,a_less,b_less) = Thresh (a, b, a_less, b_less);;

let buildTimes (e1,e2) = Times (e1, e2);;

let buildX () = VarX;;

let buildY () = VarY;;

let rec build (rand,depth) =
  if depth <= 0
  then
    let randNum = rand (0, 2) in
    match randNum with | 0 -> buildX () | 1 -> buildY ()
  else
    (let randNum = rand (0, 9) in
     match randNum with
     | 0 -> build (rand, (depth - 1))
     | 1 -> build (rand, (depth - 1))
     | 2 -> buildSine (build (rand, (depth - 1)))
     | 3 -> buildCosine (build (rand, (depth - 1)))
     | 4 ->
         buildAverage
           ((build (rand, (depth - 1))), (build (rand, (depth - 1))))
     | 5 ->
         buildTimes
           ((build (rand, (depth - 1))), (build (rand, (depth - 1))))
     | 6 ->
         buildThresh
           ((build (rand, (depth - 1))), (build (rand, (depth - 1))),
             (build (rand, (depth - 1))), (build (rand, (depth - 1))))
     | 7 -> buildOneOver (build (rand, (depth - 1)))
     | 8 ->
         buildOneOverAvg
           ((build (rand, (depth - 1))), (build (rand, (depth - 1))),
             (build (rand, (depth - 1)))));;

let rest' = t in

let rec exprToString e =

let rec eval (e,x,y) = 
match e with
| VarX		      -> x
| VarY		      -> y
| Sine e1	      -> sin(pi *. (eval(e1,x,y)))
| Cosine e1	      -> cos(pi *. (eval(e1,x,y)))
| Average (e1,e2)     -> (eval(e1,x,y) +. eval(e2,x,y)) /. 2.0
| Times (e1, e2)      -> (eval(e1,x,y) *. eval(e2,x,y))
| Thresh (e1,e2,e3,e4) -> if (eval(e1,x,y) < eval(e2,x,y)) then eval(e3,x,y)				      else eval(e4,x,y);
| OneOver(e)	      -> if eval(e,x,y) > 1.0 && eval(e,x,y) < -1.0 
then 1.0/.eval(e,x,y) 
else 1.0/.3.0;
| OneOverAvg(e1,e2,e3) -> if (eval(e1,x,y) +. eval(e2,x,y) +. eval(e3,x,y))			    > 1.0 && (eval(e1,x,y) +. eval(e2,x,y) +. eval(e3,x,y))			    < -1.0 
then 1.0/.(eval(e1,x,y) +. eval(e2,x,y) +. eval(e3,x,y)) else -1.0/.3.0

| 1   -> buildY()

match randNum with

| 3   -> buildCosine(build(rand, depth - 1))
| 4   -> buildAverage(build(rand, depth - 1), build(rand, depth - 1))
| 5   -> buildTimes(build(rand, depth - 1), build(rand, depth - 1))
| 6   -> buildThresh(build(rand, depth - 1), build(rand, depth - 1),
build(rand, depth - 1), build(rand, depth - 1))
| 7   -> buildOneOver(build(rand, depth - 1))
| 8   -> buildOneOverAvg(build(rand, depth - 1), build(rand, depth - 1),
build(rand, depth - 1))
